mods.abstract: $25 Reward -- Paid on Delivery. RANAWAY from the undersigned on the 20th of September, a yellow girl named AGNIS, well known about town as being engaged in peddling fruit for two years past, -- she is 23 or 24 years of age, has four front teeth out, ha teter worm on her lef arm, of small size, and straight black hair, had on a yellow strpied gingham dress when she left home. I will also pay twenty five dollars for any positive proff if any person or persons that has harbored or concealed her ; it is very likely that she has been coaxed off by a loafer at the river, who made her believe that he would buy her. J.W. MUSSELMAN sept26tf
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
